scripts.dev: concurrently -n "DOCKER,API,WEB" -c "cyan,blue,magenta" "docker compose up -d db" "npm run dev:wait-db" "cd apps/web && npm run dev"
scripts.dev:wait-db: npm run wait-db && cd apps/api && npm run dev
scripts.wait-db: node -e "const{exec}=require('child_process');const w=()=>exec('docker compose ps db --format json',(_,o)=>{try{const s=JSON.parse(o);if(s.Health==='healthy'||s.State==='running')console.log('✓ DB ready'),process.exit(0)}catch{}setTimeout(w,2000)});console.log('⏳ Aguardando DB...');w()"
